Please DO NOT use the QR code / pairing: Please DO NOT use the QR code / pairing code that is printed on the Matter device.
Activate BLE to pair devices nearby. You: Activate BLE to pair devices nearby of your ioBroker host, that are not already paired with an other ecosystem. You can also use the "ioBroker Visu" App to pair other devices.
Add device by pairing code or QR Code: Add device by pairing code or QR Code
Add device from channel or device: Add device from channel or device
Add via QR Code: Manuall addition of an already connected Matter device with the ioBroker Matter Controller
Additionally to bridges you can also exp:
Additionally to bridges you can also expose ioBroker states as stand alone matter devices.
They can all be paired individually.
You should prefer to use bridges.
All information of this device or bridge: All information of this device or bridge will be deleted and you must reconnect (with PIN or QR code) again.
All state information of matter controll:
The Controller and all devices and bridges will be rest to factory defaults. 
This deletes the pairing and current values for all devices, bridges and also paired devices in the controller. You cannot undo it.
The general configuration of the controller, and the assigned ioBroker states for the bridges and devices will stay unchanged.

At least one enabled bridge must exist: At least one enabled bridge must exist

Enable enhanced debug logging for the Ma: Enable enhanced debug logging for the Matter protocol (only visible with "debug" log level)
Expose ioBroker devices as Matter bridge: Expose ioBroker devices as Matter bridge
If your device has more then one active: If your device has more then one active network interface and you have issues try limiting it to one interface.
Info about Alexa Bridge: Please note: Due to limitations of the Amazon Alexa system, only one bridge or device can be paired with Alexa per ioBroker host! This selection determines which bridge will be paired with the Alexa system.
Matter Bridges Infotext:
Matter Bridges can contain multiple devices inside them and are the most simple way to bring ioBroker devices into a Matter compatible ecosystem. Devices contained in a bridge can also be added or removed after the bridge got commissioned. Some device properties can not be changed after the bridge got commissioned into a controller.

When you own at least an Assistant License in your ioBroker.pro Account you can also create multiple bridges an so structure your devices best.

Please note: Because of limitations of the Amazon Alexa system you can only have one bridge or device paired with Alexa per ioBroker host!
Matter Controller BLE Dialog Infotext:
To pair devices that use WLAN or Thread to communicate you need to provide your WLAN or Thread credentials.
These credentials are then submitted to the device during commissioning. 
If the device was already commissioned into an other ecosystem and is already in the network this is not needed.
Matter Controller Infotext:
Use the "Controller" features to integrate Matter compatible devices into ioBroker. 
You can discover and commission device and manage them afterwards. The data of the devices will be available as states in the ioBroker Objects tab. 
The controller feature is disabled by default and can be enabled with the below switch.
Matter requires enabled IPv6 protocol on: Matter requires enabled IPv6 protocol on selected interface. No IPv6 was found on your system!
Matter requires enabled IPv6 protocol on selected interface. Some IPv6 was found on your system.
Name: Name
No bridges created. Create one, by click: No bridges created. Create one, by clicking on the "+" button in the bottom right corner.
No one device created. Create one, by cl: No one device created. Create one, by clicking on the "+" button in the bottom right corner.
Pairing Info Text:
Discovering devices in your IP network. 
Please make sure that he ioBroker host can freely send and receive UDP messages in the network and in the network of the devices to discover. 
If needed reset the devices to factory settings or power cycle them.
Pairing Info Text BLE:
Discovering devices in your IP network and via BLE. 
Please make sure that he ioBroker host can freely send and receive UDP messages in the network and in the network of the devices to discover. 
If needed reset the devices to factory settings or power cycle them.
Please scan this QR-Code with the App of: Please scan this QR-Code with the App of the ecosystem you want to pair it to or use the below printed setup code.
Provide your Thread or WiFi information: Provide your Thread or WiFi information or both!
Requirements: add via QR Code: Prerequisite: The Matter device must already be commisioned to another Matter system (e.g. Google, Apple, Alexa, ...). Here you must enter the QR code pairing code or scan the QR code that is provided for this Matter device in the app by the Matter ecosystem (e.g. Google Home).
This device/bridge is linked to some eco: This device/bridge is linked to some ecosystem. If it is deleted here, you must manually remove it from your ecosystem!
To commission/connect matter devices wit: To commission/connect matter devices with ioBroker controller use better ioBroker.visu app:
To use a Matter bridge or device options: To use a Matter bridge or device options with more than 5 devices please enter valid ioBroker.pro Cloud credentials with at least an active Assistant license.
Use last value for ON: Use the last value by ON
Warning about 15 devices: To avoid problems when pairing this bridge please consider to pair it now and add more devices afterwards
You need ioBroker.pro assistant or remot: You need ioBroker.pro assistant or remote subscription to have more than 5 devices in bridge
